tool_description: Schedules social media posts for optimal timing based on audience activity patterns, platform algorithms, and specified preferences.

custom_time.description: Specific posting time in ISO 8601 format

timezone.description: Timezone for scheduling (e.g., UTC, EST, PST)

hashtags.description: Hashtags to include with the post

media_urls.description: URLs of media files to attach

error_messages: Invalid schedule type: Must be one of [immediate, optimal_time, custom_time, recurring]
Invalid custom time: Time must be in valid ISO 8601 format and in the future
Missing custom time: Custom time is required when schedule_type is custom_time
Invalid timezone: Timezone must be a valid timezone identifier
Invalid recurring pattern: Must be one of [daily, weekly, monthly] when schedule_type is recurring
usage: Provide content_text, platform, and schedule_type. For custom timing, include custom_time and timezone. For recurring posts, specify recurring_pattern.

scheduled_time.description: Final scheduled posting time in ISO 8601 format

schedule_id.description: Unique identifier for the scheduled post

estimated_reach.description: Estimated audience reach based on timing

next_occurrence.description: Next scheduled occurrence for recurring posts
